name: Day of the dead
description:
In a world of zombies ,there are always heroes. You are the one. You can play with other people and stop the zombies with a glock or a desert eagle. You will need luck. Play through multiple waves of zombies with each wave having a different type of zombie. You can play with friends or alone if you prefere. But watch out for the bosses. There are a total of three of them with each one being better.
Expected features:
  • Multiplayer
  • WallRunning
  • Two guns
  • Singleplayer
